thread.title: Grammy®-winning Jazz Pianist Raises The Bar On Online Music Lessons
thread.title_full: Grammy®-winning Jazz Pianist Raises The Bar On Online Music Lessons

author: admin
title: Grammy®-winning Jazz Pianist Raises The Bar On Online Music Lessons
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/14/2015 @ 3:00 PM Companies mentioned in this article: ArtistWorks, Inc. 
NAPA, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- The wait is over! ArtistWorks announces that Jazz piano lessons with multi-Grammy® and Emmy award winning jazz pianist, George Whitty are now available to online music students worldwide. 
George Whitty’s discography includes more than 100 CDs as a producer or musician, and he has made hundreds of compositions for film and TV. His music has been featured on nature documentaries, feature films, TV reality shows, and some of TV's longest-running series. 
“ArtistWorks has all the advantages of both a classroom environment and a private lesson. And it’s available to students anytime, anywhere in the world – at 3:00 in the morning if that’s when they choose to send me a video.” said George Whitty. “It’s really an ideal format, especially the Video Exchange® capability. I’m really pleased to be here at ArtistWorks as the online teacher of jazz piano.” 
As sole provider of the Video Exchange Learning system, ArtitstWorks offers a unique approach to online learning. Video Exchange enables master teachers to deliver personal and nuanced skills instruction to online students while at the same time serving large numbers of learners. 
For more information about the new Online Jazz Piano School with George Whitty, visit ArtistWorks.com/jazzpiano . For more information about ArtistWorks Video Exchange®, visit artistworks.com . 
About ArtistWorks, Inc. 
At ArtistWorks.com , 33 renowned musicians provide online music and performance arts lessons. The site supports most popular orchestra and band instruments and provides instruction in multiple musical genres including: Bluegrass, Country, Classical, Jazz, and Rock. Each of our online teachers has videotaped a complete curriculum of lessons that includes a logical progression of fundamental, intermediate, and advanced materials. In addition to high quality, professionally produced curriculum, ArtistWorks is the sole provider of the Video Exchange® Learning system. This unique and patented approach to online learning enables master teachers to deliver personal and nuanced skills instruction to online students.
